con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-chargeCustomer-SetOption-Waiting-Twice
con:testCase.con:description:
Test special behavior from US: DRC-1080 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-1080
Followed tests for retests in regression e2e-bugs: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-1079 must be implemented only for DirectDebit!:
1. Registration with status=WAITING_FOR_FIRST_DIRECT_DEBIT 2. First charging. Expected result: successefull 3. Second charging. Expected result: error. 3a. Reregistration with new bank-data and status=WAITING_FOR_FIRST_DIRECT_DEBIT again. 4. Third charging. Expected result: successefull 4a. Fourth charging. Expected result: error 5. Derigistration

con:request.name: chargeCustomer_onDemand
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: chargeCustomer_onDemand-Error-1202
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:chargeCustomer> <!--type: string--> <externalContractId>${#TestCase#ContractID}</externalContractId> <!--type: int--> <amount>${#TestSuite#rechargeAmount-Default}</amount> <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]--> <currency>${#Project#Currency_Default}</currency> <!--type: string--> <balanceType>${#TestSuite#chargeCustomer.balanceType}</balanceType> <!--type: string--> <referenceId>${#Project#GUID}</referenceId> <!--type: dateTime--> <paymentDate>${#Project#DateTime_Current_Offset}</paymentDate> <!--type: paymentUseCaseEnum - enumeration: [ON_DEMAND,ON_DEMAND_SMS,MONTHLY,PACKPAYMENT]--> <paymentUseCase>ON_DEMAND_SMS</paymentUseCase> <!--Optional:--> </cus:chargeCustomer> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Within WAITING_FOR_FIRST_DIRECT_DEBIT only one recharge is possible, but at least one existing found</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Within WAITING_FOR_FIRST_DIRECT_DEBIT only one recharge is possible, but at least one existing found</originatorMessage> <errorCode>1202</errorCode> <message>Within WAITING_FOR_FIRST_DIRECT_DEBIT only one recharge is possible, but at least one existing found</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
